name: Alien Search Party
description:
Alien Search Party mixes the casual genre with tower defence-style gameplay to flip the alien abduction narrative on its head. In the game, players assume the role of a pair of Supreme Aliens, who each hail from closely related species in an uneasy alliance led by Supreme Command. The pair are conducting a joint surveillance mission on Earth when their subordinates go rogue. Players must abduct all rogue subordinates before they alert any humans and tank the mission! 

Made with Unity. Earphones or headphones recommended.
